reviewText: really interesting to see the background of this important woman in the 60s & 70s art world; some of the footage of Andy Warhol and other artists of the period is stuff I've never seen before

Pretty interesting film. Good use of 90 minutes. I didn't know anything about Peggy Guggenheim before watching this or really know who she was. You get a good overview of her life and art collecting and some family history. Ask your local library to order a copy of it if you'd like to see it.
Great domentary. .  So glad if you are an art addict yourself and live in a small town , to order this video and own.  Movies like these never come to smaller metros .  Thanks.

Very informative as well as entertaining. Acknowledged Peggy Guggenheim's contribution as a collector and art patron. Wonderful for anyone who wants to learn about the luminaries in art of the 20th century.
This is very fine documentary.  Very fine indeed.  What a character she was.
this is an import and it won't play in this region
